typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as integer,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcecdchospitaldata
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceLookupCountryCode
source(output(
		date_key as string,
		date as date,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as string,
		week_of_month as string,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as string,
		year_week as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceLookupDataDim
sourcecdchospitaldata select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		reported_date = date,
		reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDropAndModify
SelectDropAndModify, sourceLookupCountryCode lookup(SelectDropAndModify@country == sourceLookupCountryCode@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimDate
LookupDimDate select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectDropAndModify@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_date,
		indicator,
		reported_year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDropUnusedColsAfterLookup
SelectDropUnusedColsAfterLookup split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k'  || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitWeeklyFromDaily@(Weekly, Daily)
sourceLookupDataDim derive(ecdc_year_week = year + '-W' + lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')) ~> DerivedColumnYearWeek
DerivedColumnYearWeek aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week),
	week_start_date = min(date),
		week_end_date = max(date)) ~> AggregateOnWeekForDate
ConditionalSplitWeeklyFromDaily@Weekly, AggregateOnWeekForDate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWeekDate
JoinWeekDate pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		week_start_date,
		week_end_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N_$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotByIndicator
ConditionalSplitWeeklyFromDaily@Daily pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily hospital occupancy', 'Daily ICU occupancy']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$N_$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotByIndicatorDaily
PivotByIndicator sort(desc(reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> SortByDateCountry
PivotByIndicatorDaily sort(desc(reported_date, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> SortByDateCountryDaily
SortByDateCountry select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		reported_week_start_date = week_start_date,
		reported_week_end_date = week_end_date,
		new_hospital_occupancy_count = {count_Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k},
		new_icu_occupancy_count = {count_Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColWeekly
SortByDateCountryDaily select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_date,
		{hospital occupancy_count} = {count_Daily hospital occupancy},
		{ICU occupancy_count} = {count_Daily ICU occupancy},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectModifyCol
SelectColWeekly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		population as string,
		daily_count as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Weekly_hospital_admission_report'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkhospitaladmissionweeklys
SelectModifyCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		population as string,
		daily_count as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Daily_hospital_admission_report'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkhospitaladmissiondaily
